casebody.data:
BRIGGS v. UNITED STATES. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. March 25, 1924.) No. 4054. H. E. Kahn, of Houston, Tex. (Mathis, Heidingsfelder, Teague & Kahn, J. Y. Meek, and C. E. Heidingsfelder, all of Houston, Tex., on the brief), for plaintiff in error. H. M. Holden, U. S. Atty., of Houston, Tex. (E. R. Warnken and Horace Soule, Asst. U. S. Attys., both of Houston, Tex., on the brief), for the United States.

Before WALKER and BRYAN, Circuit Judges, and CALL, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
